bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with hou bi 喉痹 , throat blockage. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 93 ：手足熱如火，口 生瘡舌爛，夜夢驚恐，口中䘌齒牙痛，咽痹，服（青蒿丸）五兩 , “When [a patient’s] hands and feet are hot as fire, his mouth develops sores and the tongue festers, during the night he has terrifying dreams, in his mouth there are hidden-worms teeth with toothache, and in case of throat blockage , [it is advisable] to ingest five liang [of the pills with qing hao ]”.
